root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 17-13-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: To provide a standardized instrument to monitor the macroeconomic stability of countries, the World Bank has designed a Macroeconomic dashboard including important macroeconomic indicators covering the external, financial, fiscal, and real sectors. The indicator selection builds on existing macroeconomic monitoring frameworks developed and used by international and regional agencies, such as IMF, WB, ECB, and OECD.
